content.title: National Awards For Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities: National Awards For Institutions Engaged In Empowering Persons With Disabilities: Divyangjano Ke Liye Sarvshrestha Placement Agency
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: The 'National Awards for Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities' are being awarded by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment every year since 1969 in recognition of the skills and contribution of persons with disabilities, individuals and institutions engaged in the empowerment of persons with disabilities. The 'Divyangjano Ke Liye Sarvshrestha Placement Agency' award is given by DoEPwD to the placement agency of Persons with Disabilities (excluding Government/State Government/local bodies).
benefits: The Awardee is given a Certificate and a Shield
One Award for providing holistic comprehensive Rehabilitation Services
One Award for promoting and imparting Inclusive Education
eligibility: Public Sector Undertaking or Autonomous Body or Local Government Body
content.application_process: Online application through the National Awards Portal (www.awards.gov.in) which is open from 15th June to 31st July.
documents_required: Certificate of Registration (showing the Year of Establishment)
Proofs regarding the Nature of work undertaken by the Institution
Special or Outstanding Achievements in the past 10 years
Details of Awards or Honours received
Any other Achievement for Consideration of the Award

faqs.question: When Was The 'National Award For The Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities' First Introduced?
faqs.answer: The 'National Award for the Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities' was first introduced in the year 1969.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of These Awards?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred with the objective to recognize the skills and contributions of persons with disabilities, individuals and institutions engaged in the empowerment of persons with disabilities.

faqs.question: When Were The Guidelines For These Awards Last Revised?
faqs.answer: The guidelines for the National Awards for Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities had been revised and implemented from the year 2021.

faqs.question: On Which Date And Month Are The 'National Award For The Empowerment Of Persons With Disabilities' Conferred?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred on 3rd December every year, which is the International Day of Persons with Disabilities.

faqs.question: Who Confers These Awards?
faqs.answer: The awards are conferred by the Hon'ble President or Hon'ble Vice President of India at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.

faqs.question: What Is The URL Of The National Awards Portal?
faqs.answer: National Awards Portal, Ministry of Home Affairs at https://awards.gov.in
